products.title: Filtra Voile Cream Roller Blind
products.description: This filtra voile cream roller blind is just the ticket if the glare is getting too much. Not only will it give you a bit of respite from the rays, it also provides a beautiful view of your garden, the street or any other view you may be lucky enough to have. The creamy tones wil this filtra voile cream roller blind is just the ticket if the glare is getting too much.

products.title: Filtra Voile White Roller Blind
products.description: Give yourself a break from all that glare with this beautifully stylish filtra voile roller blind. Simple, sleek and sophisticated it lets you keep your room feeling light and airy while stopping that excessive sun from making you squint. products.title: Perforated Aluminium Filtra Perfect Fit
products.description: This perforated aluminium filtra perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.
